name: US Foods Holding Corp.
description: US Foods Holding Corp. is one of the largest foodservice distributors in the United States, committed to delivering quality food products and exceptional service to its customers. Founded in 1989 and headquartered in Rosemont, Illinois, US Foods serves thousands of restaurants, hotels, and other foodservice operations across the nation. The company offers a broad array of products, including fresh, frozen, and dry food items, as well as kitchen equipment and supplies. US Foods focuses on providing innovative solutions to help its customers succeed, offering services such as menu development, marketing support, and culinary expertise through its Chef’s Line and other proprietary brands. With a strong emphasis on operational excellence, sustainability, and community engagement, US Foods strives to reduce its environmental impact and support local food systems. The company's mission is to make food experiences better for its customers and their guests, driving growth and profitability through collaboration and innovative product offerings.

seo.meta_title: US Foods Holding Corp. | Foodservice Distributor
seo.meta_description: Explore US Foods Holding Corp., a leading foodservice distributor in the US, offering a wide range of food products and culinary solutions to restaurants and foodservice operations.

faq.question: What does US Foods do?
faq.answer: US Foods is a leading foodservice distributor, providing a wide range of food and non-food products to restaurants and foodservice operations.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of US Foods?
faq.answer: Pietro Satriano is the CEO of US Foods Holding Corp.

faq.question: Where is US Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: US Foods is headquartered in Rosemont, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does US Foods offer?
faq.answer: US Foods offers a variety of products including meat, seafood, dairy, produce, frozen foods, and non-food items like cleaning supplies and kitchen equipment.
